job_purpose: To contribute to the development and maintenance of the Salesforce platform within PeopleKind Group's Applications and Solutions Delivery team.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Support ongoing development, enhancement, and optimization of Salesforce solutions
Translate business requirements into scalable, secure, and high-performance solutions
Configure and support Salesforce platform, troubleshoot and investigate issues
Collaborate with architects, analysts, and stakeholders to deliver efficient, maintainable, user-friendly solutions
required_qualifications: At least 1 year experience as a Salesforce Developer
Demonstrated experience in building and maintaining Salesforce solutions
Knowledge or experience in Apex, Lightning Web Components (LWC), SOQL, Flows, API integrations
Ability to troubleshoot complex issues in support/BAU setting
Familiarity with Agile delivery approaches and tools
Highly developed analytical and problem-solving skills
company_details: PeopleKind Group is the parent company of leading Western Australian community services organizations, delivering services in disability, housing, allied health, justice, child protection, and reintegration. The organization is committed to empowering individuals to live their best lives, embodying values of respect, compassion, courage, resilience, and collaboration.
